content: धर्म्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धर्मादनपेतः --यत्] {@--1@} Consistent with law, duty or religion, lawful, legal; <ls>Ms. 3. 22</ls>; <ls n="Ms. 3.">25-26</ls>. {@--2@} Religious (as an act); <ls>Ku. 6. 13.</ls> {@--3@} Just, righteous, fair; धर्म्याद्धि युद्धाच्छ्रेयोऽन्यत्क्षत्रियस्य न विद्यते <ls>Bg. 2. 31</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">9. 2</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 44.</ls> {@--4@} Legitimate. {@--5@} Usual. {@--6@} Endowed with particular qualities, as तद्धर्म्य.
